name: Richard Höchenberger
body:
## About Me Foo bar baz. ## Publications My **ORCID** is [0000-0002-0380-4798](http://orcid.org/0000-0002-0380-4798); my **ResearcherID** is [I-8360-2015](https://www.researcherid.com/rid/I-8360-2015). My publications are also listed on my **[Google Scholar profile](https://scholar.google.com/citations?user=CJg7pA4AAAAJ)**. * LT Boenke, **R Höchenberger,** A Zeghbib, D Alais, FW Ohl (2013): [Interaction of spatial and temporal processing in the context of audio-visual synchrony judgment and temporal-order judgment.](http://www.perceptionweb.com/abstract.cgi?id=v130807) _Perception_ 42 ECVP Abstract Supplement, 171. * LT Boenke, **R Höchenberger,** FW Ohl, D Alais (2011): [Temporal aspects of sound induced visual fission and fusion in the double-flash illusion paradigm.](http://i-perception.perceptionweb.com/journal/I/article/ic832) _i-Perception_ 2(8), 832-832. ## Résumé ### Skills & Techniques * **Programming & Analytics:** Python, R (including ggplot), and Matlab on GNU/Linux, Mac OS X, and Windows * **Typesetting:** LaTeX & LyX * **Psychophysics:** PsychoPy, Psychtoolbox * **EEG:** BrainVision Recorder & PyCorder, EEGLAB * **Hardware:** National Instruments data-acquisition boards for experimental control ## Connect * [Twitter](https://twitter.com/RHoechenberger) * [Facebook](https://facebook.com/hoechenberger) * [Google+](https://plus.google.com/109832601044645115832) * [ResearchGate](https://www.researchgate.net/profile/Richard_Hoechenberger) * [GitHub](https://github.com/hoechenberger) German Institute of Human Nutrition
– Psychophysiology of Food Perception –
Arthur-Scheunert-Allee 114–116
14558 Nuthetal
Germany Phone: +49 33 200 88 2427 ## Social Responsibility I'm a supporter of [Pro Asyl](http://www.proasyl.de/en/), an association dedicated to the preservation and enforcement of fundamental human rights of refugees in Germany and Europe.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
